message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product but $11,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $9,000?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can see that you really want this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $10,500. What do you think?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about $9,750?
I'm glad we're close, Bob! I can see you're really serious about this product. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $10,250. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $10,000 seems fair to me. What do you think?
